detaileddescription.para: Rx correlation time (Preamble + AA) for 1M PHY.
Rx correlation time (Preamble + AA) for 2M PHY.
Rx correlation time (Preamble + AA) for CODED PHY S2.
Rx correlation time (Preamble + AA) for CODED PHY S8.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* PalRadioRxComp_t) (PalRadioStatus_t status, uint32_t startOffs, PalRadioPhy_t phy, int8_t rssi)
memberdef.argsstring: )(PalRadioStatus_t status, uint32_t startOffs, PalRadioPhy_t phy, int8_t rssi)
memberdef.name: PalRadioRxComp_t

detaileddescription.para: Allow PAL to control the transmit output power level based on stack settings. This capability should be enabled if the Enhanced Power Control feature is enabled.

level
Tx power level in dBm.
Actual power level may differ from nominal level given by level. Radio implementation may limit upper and lower bounds as well as available steps. Use PalRadioGetTxPower() to read actual Tx power level.

Actual Tx power level.
Actual power level may differ from nominal level set by PalRadioSetTxPower(). Radio implementation may limit upper and lower bounds as well as available steps.

briefdescription.para: Bypass RF output power in RF_SetMode.

detaileddescription.para: This is done to meet T_MAFS timing because setting RF output power can take too long on some platforms. This is a workaround for BLE 5.4 qualification tests LL/DDI/SCN/BV-79 and LL/DDI/SCN/BV-80.

parameterdescription.para: true if connection-based CTE packet expected. false for advertising packets.

briefdescription.para: Set receive parameters for IQ sampling.

parameterdescription.para: true if connection-based CTE packet expected. false for advertising packets.

briefdescription.para: Compute byte length of CTE data.
Get GPIO switch pattern from antenna ID.

parameterdescription.para: Direction bit (typically 0 for slave and non-zero for master).

detaileddescription.para:
dueTime
Due time.
Setup the radio for a Tx operation at the given dueTime. Buffer for this operation must be set prior to the expiration of dueTime.

briefdescription.para: Set next Tx packet using TIFS timing.

parameterdescription.para: TIFS measured in microseconds from the end of the last packet.

briefdescription.para: Set next CS Tx packet using IFS timing.

parameterdescription.para: IFS measured in microseconds from the end of the last packet.

detaileddescription.para:
offsUsec
Offset in microseconds.
offsUsec is measured from the last dueTime set by PalRadioTxStart() or PalRadioRxStart().

pBuf
Tx buffer.
len
Length of pBuf.
Buffer for the next Tx operation. This routine is called after PalRadioTxStart() or PalRadioTxOffset() and before the Tx due time.

pBuf
Tx buffer.
len
Length of pBuf.
Buffer for the next Tx operation. This routine is called after PalRadioTxStart() or PalRadioTxOffset() and before the Tx due time.

pBuf
Rx buffer.
len
Length of pBuf.
Buffer for the next Rx operation. This routine is called after PalRadioRxStart() or PalRadioRxOffset() and before the Rx due time.

dueTime
Due time.
rxTimeoutUsec
Rx correlation timeout.
TBD
Setup the radio for an Rx operation at the given dueTime. Buffer for this operation must be set prior to the expiration of dueTime.

briefdescription.para: Set next Tx packet using TIFS timing.

parameterdescription.para: TIFS measured in microseconds from the end of the last packet.

briefdescription.para: Set next CS Tx packet using IFS timing.

parameterdescription.para: IFS measured in microseconds from the end of the last packet.

detaileddescription.para:
offsUsec
Offset in microseconds.
rxTimeoutUsec
Rx correlation timeout.
true if successful. false if failed.
offsUsec is measured from last dueTime set by PalRadioTxStart() or PalRadioRxStart().

simplesect.para: Radio setup must start immediately at the end of the prior operation to give as margin to ramp up the RF frontend as possible. This routine must be called as close to the end of the prior operation as possible.

briefdescription.para: Abort RX operation due to timing constraints.

detaileddescription.para: Calls the BB RX data callback chain with FAILED status to tear down the operation.

pBuf
Rx buffer.
len
Length of pBuf.
Buffer for the next Rx operation. This routine is called after PalRadioRxStart() or PalRadioRxOffset() and before the Rx due time.

briefdescription.para: Enable max PDU length in packet processor.

detaileddescription.para: Enable max PDU length in packet processor for BIS. The packet processor stop the reception of data when max PDU length is reached and generate the PDU length error.

pBuf
Rx buffer.
len
Length of pBuf.
pRxBuf
Pointer to receive buffer pointer.
rxLen
Pointer to receive length variable.
Buffer for the next Rx operation. This routine is called after PalRadioRxStart() or PalRadioRxOffset() and before the Rx due time.

briefdescription.para: Read Rx payload data from CSEM radio.

detaileddescription.para: This routine is called after PalRadioRxData() and before starting next Rx operation.

briefdescription.para: Start energy detect on a single channel.
